# data


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(jsonlite)
library(curl)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(openxlsx)
library(readxl)
library(leaflet)
```


```{r}


m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")
m  # Print the map
```
